name: XML Schema Binary File
summary: An XSB file is an XML Schema Binary file created by XMLBeans, an open source developer library used for reading and writing XML using the Java programming language. The file contains data that XMLBeans generates from a corresponding .XSD file. The resulting data allows a Java program to read, write, and validate XML data described in the XSD file during runtime.

open.note: Open with an associated app listed below.
